description: Learn how to make spring onion pancakes then top them with flavourful pork and crunchy veg.
keywords: Crispy Pork Pancakes with Asian Greens
name: Crispy Pork Pancakes with Asian Greens Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: steamed baby bok choy and snow peas

recipeInstructions.text: Heat remaining oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Cook pork for 4 minutes or until golden and crisp. Add hoisin, remaining vinegar and 2 tbs hot water and simmer for 2 minutes. Top pancakes with pork and vegetables. Drizzle with pan juices and garnish with extra spring onion.
